(Simplified: 殇)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 昜 indicates the sound; 歹 (death) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 歹 [ dǎi ] corpse; death; evil, depraved, wicked
    • ⿱ Above to below
      • 昜 [ yáng ] bright, glorious; to expand, to open up
①未成年而死：幼子早殤。
②爲國戰死者：國殤。殤魂。
(Simplified: 殇)

Pictophonetic: 昜 indicates the sound; 歹 (death) conveys the meaning.
Hanzi: 殇

Original meaning 本义: Meaning die young.

English senses 英语理解:

Usage example 用法举例: 早殤 zǎo shāng (come to an untimely end)

Importance by frequency 常用频率:

Shuowen 说文解字: 不成人也人年十九至十六死為長殤十五至十二死為中殤十一至八歲死為下殤從歺殤省聲

殤字的基本解释

殤
shāng
见“殇”。

殤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shāng］
［《廣韻》式羊切，平陽，書。］
“殇1”的繁体字。
(1)未至成年而死。
(2)指未成年而死的人。
(3)谓非正常死亡。
(4)指战死者。

殤字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【歹字部】　殤； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页583第06
【唐韻】式羊切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】尸羊切，?音商。未成人喪也。【禮·喪服傳】年十六至十九死爲長殤，十二至十五死爲中殤，八歲至十一歲死爲下殤，七歲以下爲無服之殤，生未三月不爲殤。又【禮·檀弓】周人以殷人之棺槨葬長殤，以夏后氏之墍周葬中殤、下殤，以有虞氏之瓦棺葬無服之殤。又【周禮·地官·媒氏】禁嫁殤者。【註】殤十九以下。　又諡法之一。【汲冢周書】短折不成曰殤，未家短折曰殤。　又死於國事、無主之鬼曰國殤。【楚辭】有《國殤》篇。

Mourn
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shāng］
["Guangyun" style sheep cut, Pingyang, book. ]
"殇1" in traditional characters.
(1) Died before reaching adulthood.
(2) Refers to a person who died as a minor.
(3) An abnormal death.
(4) Refers to the dead in battle.
Mourn
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Jixia] [Department of Bad Characters] 　殇; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 583 06
[Tang Yun] Style Sheep Cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Corpse Sheep Cut, Sound Quotient. Minor mourning too. [Ritual·Mourning Service Biography] Death from 16 to 19 years is a long sage, death from 12 to 15 is a middle sage, 8 to 11 years old is a sage, and under 7 years old is a sorrow without clothes. The month is not sad. Also 【Ritual·Tan Gong】The Zhou people used the Yin people's coffin to bury the long death, the Xia Hou clan's Zhou burial in the middle and the next, and the Yu clan's tile coffin to bury the undressed death. Also【Zhou Li·Di Guan·Mei Shi】Forbidden to marry those who die. [Note] Under nineteen.　One of the posthumous methods. 【Jizhong Zhoushu】Short for short breaks, but for short breaks without homes.　 Died again due to national affairs, and the ghost without an owner said the country's death. [Chu Ci] There is a chapter of "Guo Shang".
